events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is damaged with several scratches and does not work properly.
The support system has categorized this issue as a Product Defect based on the customer's description of damage and scratches.
A customer support agent specializing in product issues has been assigned to this case for further assistance.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the problem with your product. I’d be happy to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and damaged parts, as well as your order number so we can investigate further?
Here are the photos showing the scratches and the defective part of the product. My order number is 5467823.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you either a replacement or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive a replacement as soon as possible. Please proceed with that option.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped within 24 hours. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement product arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it’s in perfect condition now. Thank you very much for your prompt support.
The case has been closed following successful replacement delivery and positive customer confirmation. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We appreciate your feedback.
